value:
Though it's a departure from my
everyday dress, a kimono does have
a certain allure I've come to enjoy.

I wish I could celebrate the new year
in Dökkálfheimr with Lady Freyja...$k$pShe'd hold a banquet so lovely, it'd
be beyond even your wildest dreams.

If only for the first dream of the year,
I'd enjoy some time alone with you.
...With innocent intentions, of course.

The indecent deserve no mercy,
regardless of the year.

A new year, a chance to start anew...
Even times like these are stained by
the appetites of mortals.

So you're $Nu,
are you?$k$pI've come to deliver your first
dream of the year, with love
from $Nf...

Ahh... This year will be filled with
a love like none have ever known...

Hee hee... How were your dreams
as the new year began? Pleasant,
I hope...

Not a good sign for the year to come.
Surely some vulgar mortals are to
blame for this...

Y-you're granting me new power?
For what purpose? ...What is it you
want from me?

I am Plumeria the dökkálfr. Having to
consort with mortals at the New Year
is nothing short of a nightmare.

What hopeless beings mortals are.
The audacity to proclaim their wants
for the coming year...$k$pAnd even in this attire, I've noticed
the stares I receive from some are
similarly audacious.$k$pI hesitate to react in any way, for it
seems any action can be subverted
by an onlooker's secret desire.$k$pWith you, however, it's different.
Your gaze is gentle, like a shroud
of protective warmth.$k$pA dökkálfr has no family, but our
connection feels like I imagine family
to feel—like home, like love...
はあっ
Please sleep
ああっ…
Can't be stopped...
Your first dream...
Happy New Year.
Vulgar!
Nothing salvageable.
New year over already?
Sigh of relief
I understand this outfit is traditional in certain mortal lands... Do I look all right?
Unhand me, miscreant.
Do you know what most mortals dream of? Nothing I am willing to describe.
There seem to be many New Year's traditions. Can you tell me about some of them?
A New Year's gift...for me? Ah...thank you. Thank you very much.
Beautiful clothing, good food... This is what dreams SHOULD be.
You're staring because I am dressed unusually, right?
Yes, of course.
Like so?
The new year calls.
